  • Method Details

    • beforeClass

      @BeforeClass public void beforeClass()
      before class to initialize few properties so that it helps user in getting details in easier way from property file

    • afterClass

      @AfterClass public void afterClass()
      AfterClass acts as finisher who will put all class level logs to listener class variable so that it can be used for reporting

    • log

      public void log​(String testName, String steps, String expected, String actual, String status)
      log statement status is taken as it is from method parameter variable status
      Parameters:
      testName - test caseName
      steps - step description
      expected - expected value
      actual - actual value
      status - log status

    • log

      public void log​(String testName, String steps, String expected, String actual, String status, String attachmant)
      Parameters:
      testName - test caseName
      steps - step description
      expected - expected value
      actual - actual value
      status - log status
      attachmant - path where evidence is extracted
